comment: This turned out better than I could have hoped. Testing during fermentation and different stages of carbonization made me nervous because the allspice was pretty "in your face." However, after a solid 2+ weeks in the bottle (fully carbonated) the result was complexly layered but incredibly smooth. First you're hit with fresh peach (even a little tart), then it rounds out to a warm only slightly fruity flavor, dissipating into a warm/fresh aftertaste from the rosemary. I'm not going to change anything about this - making another batch ASAP.
